channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiTokenAndroid, Fortinet FortiTokeniOS, Fortinet FortiTokenWinApp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiTokenAndroid, Fortinet FortiTokeniOS, Fortinet FortiTokenWinApp

item.title: CVE-2021-22131|2024-08-03T18:30:24.005Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortitokenandroid%2C%20fortinet%20fortitokenios%2C%20fortinet%20fortitokenwinapp
item.description: A improper validation of certificate with host mismatch in Fortinet FortiTokenAndroid version 5.0.3 and below, Fortinet FortiTokeniOS version 5.2.0 and below, Fortinet FortiTokenWinApp version 4.0.3 and below allows attacker to retrieve information disclosed via man-in-the-middle attacks.
